Annotation Interface ExcelStyle

@Retention(SOURCE) @Target({}) public @interface ExcelStyle
Defines the styling properties for headers or data cells in the generated Excel file. Used within ColumnDefinition to customize appearance.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    String
    alignment
    The text alignment: "LEFT", "CENTER", or "RIGHT".
    String
    backgroundColor
    The background color in hexadecimal format (e.g., "FFFF00" for yellow).
    boolean
    bold
    Whether the font should be bold.
    String
    fontName
    The font name to use (e.g., "Arial", "Times New Roman").
    int
    fontSize
    The font size in points (e.g., 12).

  • Element Details

    • backgroundColor

      String backgroundColor
      The background color in hexadecimal format (e.g., "FFFF00" for yellow). Empty string means no color.
      Returns:
      the background color
      Default:
      ""

    • fontName

      String fontName
      The font name to use (e.g., "Arial", "Times New Roman").
      Returns:
      the font name
      Default:
      "Arial"

    • fontSize

      int fontSize
      The font size in points (e.g., 12).
      Returns:
      the font size
      Default:
      12

    • bold

      boolean bold
      Whether the font should be bold.
      Returns:
      true if bold, false otherwise
      Default:
      false

    • alignment

      String alignment
      The text alignment: "LEFT", "CENTER", or "RIGHT".
      Returns:
      the alignment
      Default:
      "CENTER"
